segments.advisor_message: So, let’s confirm your name details. Could you tell me your full name, including any titles and middle names?
segments.client_message: Um, actually, my name is just, uh, Michelle Taylor. No titles and I don’t really use my middle name, so just Michelle Taylor is fine.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! Just Michelle Taylor. And what about your date of birth? Do you want to share that with me?
segments.client_message: Oh, wait, I think I might change that a bit. It’s actually 15-04-1990, not 1991. I got, um, confused there for a moment.
